channel.title: [PI] Dds glitch 0 hit takes damage
channel.description:
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/838/ddsb.jpg/][IMG]http://img838.imageshack.us/img838/186/ddsb.jpg[/img][/URL]
[i]Okay first of all, when you hit a 0-0 it only comes up as you see in the pic with only 1 0 hitsplat, but in some cases itll a hit a 0 and take damage off - as u can tell by the pic i specced and it showed a 0 hitsplat and took damage from him..[/i]
[b]if anyone knows a fix or any tips on where to find the solution please post! ++[/b]

item.title: [PI] Dds glitch 0 hit takes damage
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Did you follow a tutorial for the combat icon’s before the damage?

item.title: [PI] Dds glitch 0 hit takes damage

item.description:
@Dell wrote:

Okay first of all, when you hit a 0-0 it only comes up as you see in the pic with only 1 0 hitsplat, but in some cases itll a hit a 0 and take damage off - as u can tell by the pic i specced and it showed a 0 hitsplat and took damage from him…
